name: 她2 : 我还想再见到你   Her2 : I Want To See You Again
description: This is a antique style game with TCG & LVG ,you need to carry out the character training of heroine in 6 years and finish all the plots. There are 16 endings.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows7/8/10 Processor: Dual Core Memory: 2 MB RAM Graphics: Pixelshader 3.0 enabled graphics card(DirectX 10 capable graphics card) Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Realtek High Definition Audio
